components.name: VdcSideNav
components.description: 2-tier side navigation with icon rail (tier 1) and content panel (tier 2). Supports Global, Personal, and Project contexts with collapsible panel.
templateChanges: Project browser with search, 'My Projects' filter pill, and cancel switch
Entity icons on all navigation items
Project initials shown in rail when project is selected
Bottom utilities section with user profile, help, and theme toggle
designDecisions: Active context uses dimmed/bright icon approach (40% inactive, 100% active)
Active nav items use context color for text, icon, border, and background tint
Filter pill uses context color when active
Panel header height matches top nav (48px)
Project initials derived from shortcode (first 3 chars before dash)
Cancel switch allows returning to previous project without selecting new one
Icon rail uses context colors (global/personal/project) as background
VDC logo uses white variant for visibility on dark backgrounds

components.name: VdcTopNav
components.description: Top navigation bar with breadcrumbs (VdcBreadcrumbs), panel collapse button, and release search. Integrates with VdcSideNav for panel expansion control.
templateChanges: Release search with rocket-launch icon prefix and search button suffix
designDecisions: Collapse button uses fa-angles-left (expanded) and fa-angles-right (collapsed)
Release search includes clear button and enter-to-search support
